ing: 4 large ripe avocados - halved, pitted, and peeled
des: "When I first entered a coffee shop with some friends, they suggested the avocado milkshake. It sounded gross at first but I found it was actually very sweet, smooth, and creamy. Don't pass this smoothie up. Serve with whipped cream on top."
ins: Combine avocados, ice cubes, milk, and sugar in a blender; blend on medium speed until smooth, 3 to 5 minutes. Pour into serving glasses.
